author: fmeschbe
msg: No need to decode the URI string in resolve(String uri) as either
this string is provided by any servlet or script, where it certainly
is not encoded, or by the resolve(HttpServletRequest) method which
uses the HttpServletRequest.getPathInfo() value, which is decoded
by the servlet container according to the API spec.

author: ebourg
msg: Removed the direct dependency on Commons Logging, the java.util.logging API is used instead
